tool_description: Searches for files and directories within a specified path using name patterns, with options for recursive traversal and case sensitivity.

search_path.description: Root directory path to start the search from

name_patterns.description: File name patterns to match (supports wildcards like *.txt, test_*)

case_sensitive.description: Whether pattern matching is case sensitive

include_directories.description: Whether to include directories in results

error_messages: Invalid search path: Ensure the provided path exists and is accessible.
Empty name patterns: At least one name pattern must be provided.
Invalid max depth: Value must be between 1 and 50.
Permission denied: Insufficient permissions to access the specified directory.
Path too long: The search path exceeds system limits.
usage: Provide search_path and name_patterns array. Optionally configure recursive search, case sensitivity, directory inclusion, and maximum depth. Returns a list of matching file paths.

file_paths.description: Array of absolute file paths that match the search criteria

search_duration.description: Time taken to complete the search in seconds
